Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: Hi! I'm currently on an exchange program from Termina.^They say that East Clock Town is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Lost Woods Stage#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Map of the Spirit Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #the Lost Woods# is on the path to the #Spirit Medallion#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Light Trial)

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Spirit Temple Compass#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_items: Silver Rupee Pouch (Ganons Castle Spirit Trial)

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path of #time#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #3# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: Having trouble defeating Dark Link?^Look away from him while holding Z-Target and then when Dark Link walks up behind you, strafe sideways and slash your sword.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #lakeside lab diving experiment# rewards #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Zelda's Letter#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Heart Container#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Silver Rupee Top Right

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #wooden walls# in the Shadow Temple hide...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Arrows (10 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Spike Walls Left Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Granny's Potion Shop#.
